titles.title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with regard to the Reagan-Udall Foundation.
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with regard to the Reagan-Udall Foundation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to revise Board of Directors membership, Executive Director compensation, and accounting for the Reagan-Udall Foundation for the Food and Drug Administration.
